LinkDef.h File Reference

Commands for ROOT dictionary generation. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Commands for ROOT dictionary generation.

This file contains directives for all classes/functions that need to have a dictionary generated for ROOT. This is necessary either to store instances of classes in a tree, or to use them in the interactive ROOT.

Note that any class which will be stored in an stl container needs to have that container specifically defined as well

Definition in file LinkDef.h.
